backup.title: Backup codes

visual.description: Keep these codes in a safe place so as not to lose access to your account
visual.step1description: Save these codes on your device or print them
visual.step2description: Keep these codes in a safe place as a password manager
visual.title: Backup of codes

backup.warning: Use these codes if you lose access to your phone

card.appdescription: Use Google Authenticator, Authy or another app
card.emaildescription: Receive temporary codes on your mailbox
card.webauthndescription: Use your device or a physical safety key

visual.description: You will no longer need the authentication application to connect
visual.step1description: Make sure you keep an active method for safety of your account
visual.step2description: Enter the application code one last time
visual.step3description: In the application, delete Stepify temporary code
visual.title: Deactivation of double authentication by application

visual.description: You will no longer receive double authentication codes by email
visual.step1description: Make sure you keep an active method for safety of your account
visual.step2description: Enter your password to confirm the deactivation
visual.title: Disabling double authentication by email

visual.description: You will no longer have to use your safety key or your device to connect
visual.step1description: Make sure you keep an active method for safety of your account
visual.step2description: Enter your password to confirm the deactivation
visual.step3description: On your device, delete the safety key or the fingerprint associated with Stepify
visual.title: Disabling double authentication by safety key

main.description:
Two -factory authentication adds an additional safety layer to your account. 
Choose one or more verification methods.
main.title: Configuration of double authentication

visual.methods-description: If you lose access to one of your methods, you can always use the others to connect.
visual.options-description: You can activate several double authentication methods for more security.
visual.preferred-method-description: If you have activated several methods, your favorite method will be used by default for connections.

setup-app.description: Scan this QR code with your authentication application (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.) or enter the key manually.
setup-app.title: Configuration of the authentication application

visual.step1description: Download Google Authenticator, Authy or another authentication application
visual.step2description: Open the application and scan the QR code or enter the key manually

visual.description: Add a biometric authentication method or a physical key
visual.step1description: Use your fingerprint, facial recognition or USB key
visual.step2description: Follow your browser's instructions to finalize the configuration
visual.title: Safety key configuration

visual.app-step1description: Open your authentication application to obtain the code
visual.description: Enter the 6 -digit code to finalize activation
visual.email-step1description: Consult your mailbox to find the verification code
visual.step2description: Enter the 6 -digit code to confirm the activation
visual.title: Code verification

webauthn.device-name: Device name you want to add
webauthn.no-devices: No device has a recorded key

delete.confirm-description:
This action is irreversible. 
All your data will be definitively deleted.
delete.description: Delete your account permanently and all your data
delete.subtitle: Delete account
delete.title: Danger zone

notif.friend-activity-description: Notifications for the activity of your friends
notif.goal-reached-description: Notifications when you reach your goals
notif.title: Notifications

password.weak: The password is not strong enough

privacy.friend-setting-subtitle: Allow friends to see your activity

theme.description: Choose the appearance of the application
theme.title: Theme
